text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After hours and hours of rain<n>stretching well into the
afternoon, the<n>clouds finally clear away, signaling<n>the start
of the scrimmage.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Wow, this place is packed with<n>people! I'm not surprised<n>
though—Grass Wonder's going to be<n>racing today!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
The track doesn't look too good after<n>all that rain... but I'm
sure this is<n>nothing for Grass.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hello, King! Let's have a good race<n>today.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I'll give you the honor of facing me,<n>Grass! I'll show you
what a first-rate<n>running style looks like!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …So, you're here again.
choice_data_list: Yeah, I came to see you participate.
Yeah, I came to see you participate.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hmm... You're more stubborn than I<n>expected.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
...I don't mind though. If that's how<n>badly you want to
watch me run, then<n>I'll give you a show! Ohohoho!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Looks like King's doing just fine.
choice_data_list: Did you come here to support King too?
Did you come here to support King too?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Nyahaha, nah. I didn't have much to<n>do today, so I'm just
here to kill some<n>time.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, looks like the race is<n>starting. You better pay close<n>
attention. If she finds out you weren't<n>properly looking,
she'll get all upset.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Clear the way! I'm coming through!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, King Halo's charging to the<n>front! Maybe she's
good at races that<n>require power, just like her mother?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Who knows. It's too early to say for<n>sure yet. Let's keep
watching.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... I will... prove that...I'm first-rate!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, this is new from King. I guess<n>she doesn't wanna get
stuck again in<n>the middle of the pack like at the<n>tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
But her body's stiffening up under all<n>that energy she's
putting in. This<n>always happens to her whenever she<n>gets
too pent up about something.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Ah, what a shame. If only she learned<n>to relax and run more
freely...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: It's the final stretch! Look, Grass<n>Wonder's coming!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hnnngh!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
She's a force to be reckoned with! I<n>don't see a hint of
weakness in her<n>gait! The gap between her and King is<n>
rapidly increasing!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... Looks like Grass ended up<n>being the star of today's
show.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, the race comes to an end.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: I always knew Grass Wonder would<n>win.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
It doesn't look like she's accepting<n>any scouting offers
right now, but I'd<n>love to have a chat with her at the<n>next
tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Me too! As for King Halo... well, I'm<n>sure she got a reality
check after<n>seeing today's results.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohohoho! Next time will be different!<n>Get ready everyone,
because you all<n>haven't even seen my best yet!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The other trainers turn to her with a<n>look of exasperation on
their faces as<n>she flaunts her usual demeanor.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
That's right, pay careful attention!<n>Remember my words—I
am King Halo,<n>the first-rate racer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Regardless of the defeats,<n>disappointments, or ridicule, her<n>
endless commitment pushes her to<n>the finish line.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If commitment is what she wants to<n>see, then there's only
one thing for<n>me to do!
choice_data_list: And I am a first-rate trainer!
And I am a first-rate trainer!

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Huh?
choice_data_list: That's why I want to scout a first-rate racer!
That's why I want to scout a first-rate racer!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Umm... are you okay? Did you<n>mistake her for Grass
Wonder?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: You do realize the person in front of<n>you is King Halo, right?
choice_data_list:
That's right! I'm here for King Halo and no one
else!

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: Murmur...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...Hey, you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Are you sure you have what it takes<n>to push the boundaries
of my<n>overwhelming talent?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Are you sure you're ready to become<n>an unstoppable force
and spread my<n>name around the world?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...Very well. Everyone here—listen up!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
From this day forward, I, the first-rate<n>King Halo, will join
hands with this<n>first-rate trainer!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Get ready because we're going to<n>take the Twinkle Series
by storm and<n>win every race! Better grab a pair of<n>
sunglasses so you don't get blinded<n>by our glory!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Come, Trainer. We have documents<n>to sign!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...Honestly, why on earth did you do<n>that?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Do you truly understand what calling<n>yourself "first-rate" in
front of<n>everyone is going to do?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
People are going to laugh at you and<n>make fun of you
behind your back.<n>The world will crush your shoulders.<n>
But you can't take those words back.
choice_data_list:
Then I've got no choice but to truly become
first-rate.

Then I've got no choice but to truly become
first-rate.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Heh, what a dummy. You're more<n>stubborn and clumsy
than I could've<n>ever imagined!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...But I guess it's not a bad thing.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Bzzz... Bzzz...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ah, it's Mother again...
choice_data_list: We should make a statement together.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Huh? A statement?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...Hehe. Now that's what I like to<n>hear!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
All right, I'm going to answer now.<n>Are you ready? On three!
One, two...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, my pursuit of first-rate<n>greatness with King Halo
officially<n>begins.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hello, Mother? I have an<n>announcement to make. No, I'm
not<n>going home. In fact, let me introduce<n>my new trainer to
you!
